statements: SELECT player_name, total_score FROM player_statistics WHERE games_played > 100;
SELECT * FROM player_statistics WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT games_played, total_score FROM player_statistics ORDER BY total_score DESC;
SELECT player_name, games_played, total_score FROM player_statistics WHERE achievements @> '{"level": 5}';
SELECT player_id, player_name, total_score FROM player_statistics WHERE total_score BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT player_name, total_score FROM player_statistics WHERE games_played > 10
SELECT player_name, games_played, total_score FROM player_statistics WHERE total_score > 500 ORDER BY total_score DESC
SELECT * FROM player_statistics WHERE games_played BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY player_name ASC
SELECT player_name, SUM(total_score) AS total_score FROM player_statistics GROUP BY player_name HAVING SUM(total_score) > 1000
SELECT player_name, games_played, JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(achievements) AS num_achievements FROM player_statistics ORDER BY num_achievements DESC, player_name ASC
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM players WHERE total_score > 100 ORDER BY player_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM achievements WHERE achievement_points >= 50 ORDER BY achievement_name DESC;
SELECT player_name, total_score FROM players WHERE player_id = 3;
SELECT player_name, achievement_name, achievement_points FROM players JOIN achievements ON players.player_id = achievements.player_id ORDER BY achievement_points DESC;
SELECT player_name, total_score FROM players WHERE total_score > 100 ORDER BY total_score DESC;
SELECT player_name, achievement_name, achievement_points FROM players p JOIN achievements a ON p.player_id = a.player_id WHERE p.total_score > 50 ORDER BY achievement_points ASC;

SELECT player_name, achievement_name, achievement_points FROM players p JOIN achievements a ON p.player_id = a.player_id WHERE p.total_score < 100 AND a.achievement_points > 20 ORDER BY p.total_score ASC, a.achievement_points DESC;
SELECT player_name, total_score, achievement_name FROM players p LEFT JOIN achievements a ON p.player_id = a.player_id WHERE p.total_score > 150 ORDER BY achievement_name;

SELECT player_id, player_name, achievement_name, achievement_points FROM players p LEFT JOIN achievements a ON p.player_id = a.player_id WHERE p.total_score >= 100 ORDER BY player_id ASC, achievement_points DESC;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_rating FROM players ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT player_name, total_score FROM players JOIN player_stats ON players.player_id = player_stats.player_id WHERE total_score > 1000;
SELECT achievement_name, achievement_points FROM achievements ORDER BY achievement_points DESC;
SELECT player_name, games_played, total_score FROM players JOIN player_stats ON players.player_id = player_stats.player_id WHERE games_played >= 10 AND total_score < 500;
SELECT player_name, player_rating FROM players WHERE player_rating > 7.5 ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT player_name, total_score FROM players JOIN player_stats ON players.player_id = player_stats.player_id WHERE games_played > 50 ORDER BY total_score DESC;
SELECT achievement_name, achievement_points FROM achievements WHERE achievement_points >= 100 ORDER BY achievement_points DESC;

SELECT player_name, total_score, achievement_name FROM players JOIN player_stats ON players.player_id = player_stats.player_id JOIN achievements ON player_stats.total_score >= achievements.achievement_points ORDER BY player_name ASC;

SELECT player_name, SUM(total_score) AS total_score_sum FROM players JOIN player_stats ON players.player_id = player_stats.player_id GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_score_sum > 500 ORDER BY total_score_sum DESC;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM players WHERE player_score > 1000;

SELECT player_name, achievement_name, achievement_description FROM players JOIN player_achievements ON players.player_id = player_achievements.player_id JOIN achievements ON player_achievements.achievement_id = achievements.achievement_id;
SELECT player_name, achievement_date FROM players JOIN player_achievements ON players.player_id = player_achievements.player_id WHERE achievement_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY achievement_date DESC;

SELECT player_name, COUNT(achievement_id) AS total_achievements FROM players LEFT JOIN player_achievements ON players.player_id = player_achievements.player_id GROUP BY players.player_name HAVING total_achievements > 2;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM players WHERE player_score > 100 ORDER BY player_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM achievements WHERE achievement_name LIKE 'Achievement%';

SELECT player_name, achievement_name FROM players INNER JOIN player_achievements ON players.player_id = player_achievements.player_id INNER JOIN achievements ON player_achievements.achievement_id = achievements.achievement_id;

SELECT player_name, COUNT(*) AS total_achievements FROM players LEFT JOIN player_achievements ON players.player_id = player_achievements.player_id GROUP BY players.player_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY total_achievements DESC;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM players WHERE player_score > 100;
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM players ORDER BY player_score DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_score, player_id FROM players WHERE player_score < 50 ORDER BY player_id;
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM players WHERE player_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM players WHERE player_score > 100;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM players WHERE player_score < 50 ORDER BY player_score DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM players WHERE player_score BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_score FROM players WHERE player_score = (SELECT MAX(player_score) FROM players);
SELECT player_name, achieve_id, completed_date FROM players JOIN player_achievements ON players.player_id = player_achievements.player_id;
